text: Success is not the absence of failure, but the persistence through failure.
author: Arie Pencovici

text: Adventure may hurt you, but monotony will kill you.
author: Marcus Purvis

text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

text: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
